content: and single_crochet 6 through both layers use black to add stitch lines legs - make two - one in body color and one starts in charcoal or darker gray 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 6-10 single_crochet around 5r of 30 11 single_crochet 7 decrease x6 single_crochet 11 24 switch to main body color on last stitch 12-13 single_crochet around 24 14 single_crochet 7 decrease x3 single_crochet 11 21 15 single_crochet 7 decrease x2 single_crochet 10 19 16 single_crochet 7 decrease single_crochet 10 18 17-18 single_crochet around 18 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing use black to add stitch lines to legs adding a few extra stitches where the gray and body color meet ears - make 2 - body color 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4-6 single_crochet around 18 7 decrease single_crochet 7 decrease single_crochet 7 16 fo leave tail for sewing inner ear - make 1 big & 1 small in belly patch color or a lighter body color big - 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 15 3 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 slip_stitch into next fo weave in end small - 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 slip_stitch into next fo weave in end sew inner ear to front of ears using black tail - in body color 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 4-7 single_crochet around 4r of 15 flatten single_crochet 6 across through both layers fo leave tail to sew to butt add stitch lines to head body & limbs if you haven t done so already over the mouth you will make the following stitches - / x / x / x / x / x or whatever stitches you prefer
